author: Tiffanie Liz
comment: Thanks for the update but know I can't seem to find the settings to adjust the BOW faces within the Android Wear app. I'll have patience since hopefully it's being worked on now.
title: Love it!! Paid for it!! But now it feels abandoned...

author: robert bello
comment: Not very cause its stock the pic that use..
title: Very application

author: ci2real4u
comment: Doing nothing to my phone

author: Eric Merrill
comment: This is a great app.  I paid for it, not because I cared about changing the position or text color, but because it's worth the price of a ice cream cone, latte, soft drink, etc for the free version.  Would love it if you added ability to:  - change size (time and date independently)  - change font independently for date and time  - change text color independently for date and time(sometimes the image requires separate colors)  - select date format 'July 7' without the the day.   And for a stretch, not sure if it's feasible, but sending multiple watch faces to watch so that you could switch between them at will.  If this isn't possible, would be nice to save them on phone and resend saved ones at will.
title: Great watch face!

author: Robert Underwood
comment: App dead? Abandoned? This app has not been updated since July, 2014. It lacks many features that are now more common in other (free) Wear watch faces. Such a shame. It had great potential.
title: ABANDONED APP... no new features for paid version.

author: David B.
comment: First issue: set it up and looked perfect at the time I put it together. 10:00 comes around and the last 0 falls out of place. Minor as I as able to adjust it, but is hard unless it's currently that time. Second which is why I cannot use it, it was literally skipping minutes which didn't occur on any other watch face. It would stay on one minute for too long then quickzily pass the next one to the proper time.                Edit: apparently it's my watch skipping minutes as I caught it doing on another fac
title: Good but has two issues

author: Indy Jones
comment: Opacity was free. New update makes it $1.99. That's a fail. This is a pretty basic watch face man. Not at all worth it when you take away standard features
title: Greedy

author: Paul Parry
comment: The advanced features are just not quite good enough to make a difference. A big update would be to change the text colour & also the text size. ALSO WHAT ABOUT THE COLOUR WHEN IN IDLE MODE? ???? PLEASE UPDATE ASAP!
title: Good but could be better

author: Ben Udkow
comment: This is great!  Almost full customization of the watch face.  Couple things I'd like is to be able to hide "PM" in 12-hour mode (I know if it's morning or night).  Also I'd like to be able to change the font size along with the font face.  I bought the premium version and it's nice to be able to get everything lined up just right so the time isn't on my kids faces. :-)
title: Super nice!

author: Imperial Y.
comment: Only thing missing right now is the ability to not only move the text around, but resize the characters! Also the ability to add personal text to the screen.
title: Awesome so far!

comment: My favorite watch face. Big, clear, informative. Lots of customization. I think 2 dollars is a bit pricey, though, so I'm sticking to the free version.
title: Very nice

author: David Sholl
comment: Purchased the add for colors but won't send the watch faces i create to my g watch. App on my phone says it has been sent but nothing on the watch disappointed
title: Won't update on my watch

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: Add text sizing of the different elements, and more fonts, and I'll rate it 5 stars. So simple to use and looks great.
title: Awesome!

author: Rick Masters
comment: Best watch face for notifications.  Advanced option allowed me to move the date higher so not blocked.  Worth paying for. Perfect!
title: Great!

author: Greta Hilburn
comment: Fairly easy to use. Glad to be able to customize my android wear. Finally!
title: Great app

comment: Best app for Android wear, worth the upgrade fee!  Keep up the good work

author: Miquel Beltran
comment: there are better alternatives to this app for free, don't waste your time.
title: meh

author: Simon Butler
comment: That user can design. Please continue increasing the options!
title: Custom watchfaces

author: Brian S
comment: Great watch face and customizable just what I needed
title: G watch

author: Steve Watson
comment: It is great although the only thing that is annoying is that when I position the time it defaults back to the left align after a while - once this is fixed it will be perfect.
title: Great but....

author: Lee Petchey
comment: Keep up the great work! Love the updates. Need more 'blocky' fonts that are easier to see in ambient mode.
title: Best watchface app so far

author: Chris Lae
comment: This was the first app I installed the day I picked up my LG G Watch. I gotta say, great job! And the most recent update makes it even better. Keep up the great work!
title: Simply Fantastic!

author: Matt Barr
comment: LG G Watch, super easy, looks great. You'll want something else if you want custom colors, layouts etc. but this does a great job.
title: Terrific little background creator

author: gary thompson
comment: I love the app.  Just a few suggestions having weather and making the notifications smaller like in Stock watchfaces
title: Great app

author: Raphael Scalise
comment: Does everything I've been looking for, and very easy to use.
title: Perfect!

author: Michael Warren
comment: Excellent app let's you customise your android wear watch faces

author: Mohamad Al Suwaidi
comment: It would be nice if you can control the size also >>
title: Suggestion ..

author: John Gaetano
comment: Great app.  Works great. Well done! Would love to be able to save watch faces. Needs smaller fonts options.  Also add the ability to change font colors.
title: Amazing app for Android Wear

author: Davy Moon
comment: Sending customised watch faces to wear doesn't work. I just get the default one every time.
title: Doesn't work

author: Eric Strianese
comment: Love the customization options of the latest update. Being able to move the date up so it doesn't clash with notification cards is great. Thanks dev.
title: Awesome Job

author: Nick Barone
comment: Please make a way to remove the Date and AM/PM - I am a paying customer and would not mind this as a premium feature.
title: Remove date and AM/PM

author: Robert Hahn
comment: ... I would love to change the font size of the time and date and I want to have the possibility to hide the date.
title: Great but,

author: Travis Williams
comment: Awesome update. Now I can view time and date while the top card is peeking.
title: Great app

author: Josh Kasten
comment: The default Android Wear faces include "Dual clock" and "Text"  which include the date but nothing with  a simple digital display with the date. Also the "Press Start 2P" 8-bit font is cool. Only which there was an option for custom text color so I can make the font green. Still worth a 5/5 though.
title: Fills in the gap

author: Cole Bauer
comment: The date is in a kind of poor location. It is at the bottom where the most recent notification sits, so it overlaps and looks pretty terrible. Other than that I love the functionality. I like having a picture there and the size of the clockface is great.
title: Like the functionality, but has one major flaw

author: Tom Dawson
comment: The font options are good, and the way images are handled is equally good. It works quickly with little hassle as well. With the ability to move the clock and date position, or to remove the data altogether would be nice to see as well as perhaps a way to show up cards as their smaller form? Not sure how/if that could be done.   Easily the best way to make a watch face right now - perhaps the ONLY way for end users!
title: Brilliant so Far!

author: Matt Wilkinson
comment: I love seeing this designer! Keep up the good work. Missing a star just because when screen dims, I lose the day of the week and the date gets pixelated and wonky.  Any suggestions?
title: Great work!

author: Cameron Bulock
comment: This is a great concept, similar to Canvas that Pebble's have.  One feature I would like to see would be hiding the date when the screen is ambient.  Right now, any notifications are overlapping the date.
title: Love the idea

author: Mike Johnson
comment: Yes! Just what I was waiting for. Options are quite limited but great start to personalisation on wear. I hope for more fonts & the ability to add/remove and adjust size & position of elements. Hopefully these will come in future updates.
title: Brilliant!

author: Arul Selvan
comment: Very cool add on to my watch. Just a humble request to the developer: can you display the date bit higher because it is covered by active notifications that pop over it. Also , it would be cool to have a weather display as well.
title: Great app
